newsitem.title: USA: Stocks fall ahead of July jobs report.
newsitem.headline: Stocks fall ahead of July jobs report.

text.p: Blue-chip stocks pulled back on Thursday as investors stepped aside ahead of Friday's July employment report, but the Nasdaq set another record high.

Based on early and unofficial data, the Dow Jones industrial average lost 32.28 points to close at 8,222.61. In the broader market, advancing issues led declines by a 17-11 margin on volume of about 553 million shares on the New York Stock Exchange. The Nasdaq index added 5.75 points to 1,593.80.
